Lessons from Steve Jobs

Blair wrote this on 24 Nov

When I heard @guykawasaki, former Chief Apple evangelist, was coming to town I knew I had to see him. He taught some familiar lessons he learnt while working for Steve Jobs in the '80s.

Here are some of the visual notes I took.

You can see more of them on Pinterest.

You should also check out Guy's new book. I've owned the first version since 2008. To this day it's still one of the most valuable business book I've read.
